Title: Scheduled
Description: This milestone has been scheduled for the date in milestone.dueDate. Progress towards the milestone has not yet been evaluated as of milestone.dateModified

Title: Met
Description: This milestone has been achieved. The data on which it was met should be placed in the milestone.dateMet field

Title: Not met
Description: This milestone had not been met at the date it was last reviewed (see milestone.dateModified).

Title: Partially met
Description: This milestone was judged to have been partially met at the date it was last reviewed (see milestone.dateModified)
